author: jleroux
msg: As suggested by Jacopo on dev ML, uses "svn patch" rather than patch.exe, much simpler and elegant, though needs an svn client installed, which seems a correct compromise.

author: pderop
msg: Improved the way parallel components are configured: now the "org.apache.felix.dependencymanager.parallel" OSGi system property can be set to
"*" (meaning all components will be handled in parallel), or to a list of component classname prefixes, possibly starting with "!".
This allows to enable parallelism for only a subset of components, or for all components, excepts for some given components ...
See design.txt file for for more informations.

author: struberg
msg: update TCK to latest available version
